title.text: Employer Not Paying Salary or Wages

description.text: When your employer refuses to pay your salary, wages, or withholds payment without valid reason

combined.text: Employer Not Paying Salary or Wages - When your employer refuses to pay your salary, wages, or withholds payment without valid reason, you have legal rights to recover your dues and take action for non-payment.

keywords.text: salary not paid wages withheld employer not paying wage theft salary delay unpaid salary payment of wages act labor complaint wage recovery

variations.text: My company is not paying my salary for the last 3 months
Employer refuses to pay overtime wages
Boss is holding my salary without reason
How to recover unpaid wages from previous employer
Company closed without paying final salary

notes: This is sample embedding data with truncated vectors for demonstration
Vectors shown here are shortened to 5 dimensions for readability
